Makes it hard to help you out on this one.

Since the robots.txt doesn't explicitly ban robots from articles' pages of the site,
and the subscriber agreement seems to say alls well as long as its all for 
'personal use' only, have you tried logging in with mozilla, saving the cookies
you get from nytimes and loading them up into the crawler? (See the
'load-cookies-from-file' expert setting on HTTPFetcher).

Yours,
St.Ack
